messages.title: You can trust Martin to clean up politics
messages.content: Martin Horwood has been at the forefront of the campaign to clean up politics and end the abuse of expenses.

messages.title: Who can we trust if we need help?
messages.content: Martin pulled all the stops out to get the new Echo machine for the cardiac unit at the GRH.

messages.title: A true champion for Cheltenham
messages.content: Martin has been Cheltenham's MP since 2005 with a strong record of community service.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Martin has fought cuts and worked to protect services at St Paul's maternity ward and elsewhere.
Martin opposed a Tory plan for a Gloucester Parkway Station which would threaten services at Cheltenham station.
Martin has a keen interest in protecting the countryside against flooding and has worked with green campaigners.
Martin Horwood has called for reform of banking regulations, to stop bonuses and the big trade in unreliable and toxic financial products.
Martin Horwood has been proactive in efforts to clean up politics and end the abuse of expenses.

mentions.candidate: Martin Horwood has fought cuts and worked to protect local services.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Tory candidate stood in Hastings 2018 & 2005. The Conservative candidate has said that charging you up to £10 to see your GP is 'worthy of consideration'. Lord Ashcroft is trying to help the Tory candidate.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can’t win in Cheltenham. It’s a two horse race here! Voting Labour here will only help the Conservatives. Nick Clegg’s party fairer.

issues.economy: Martin Horwood has called for reform of banking regulations, to stop bonuses and the big trade in unreliable and toxic financial products.
issues.environment: Martin is fighting to protect homes from flooding and our countryside.
issues.governance: Martin Horwood has been at the forefront of the campaign to clean up politics and end the abuse of expenses.
issues.health: Martin has fought cuts and worked to protect services at St Paul's maternity ward and elsewhere.

leaflet.personalStatement: Martin is a superb man and one of the few honest people to have fought against the excesses system.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought cuts and worked to protect local services, opposed a Tory plan for a Gloucester Parkway Station.

quotes.text: Martin is a superb man and one of the few honest people to have fought against the excesses system.
quotes.source: Bill Galvin, Editor of Every Friday (Random House)

images.caption: Martin Horwood addressing various public events

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet compares Martin Horwood with the Tory candidate and emphasizes that Labour cannot win in Cheltenham, suggesting strategic voting.
